problem.markdown:
>>Fossil fuels are formed as a result of which of the following?<< ( ) chemical respiration ( ) combustion of organic material ( ) emission of carbon dioxide (x) sedimentation and burial of organic matter ( ) decomposition of igneous rocks
[explanation] During sedimentation, solid organic carbon settles and is buried at the bottom of the ocean or freshwater systems to create sediments rich in carbon (fossilized carbon, or fossil fuels).
[explanation]
problem.p: Fossil fuels are formed as a result of which of the following?

choicegroup.label: Fossil fuels are formed as a result of which of the following?
choicegroup.choice: sedimentation and burial of organic matter

div.p: During sedimentation, solid organic carbon settles and is buried at the bottom of the ocean or freshwater systems to create sediments rich in carbon (fossilized carbon, or fossil fuels).
